name: Residence Inn Milpitas Silicon Valley

reviews.text: Stayed there in December of 2005 on a family vacation. Front desk employees very accomodating and helpful. Breakfast basic but good enough. Room was cleaned daily including dirty dishes. Everyone there went out of their way to make us feel at home. Would stay again there any time.
reviews.title: Great place to stay!
Serious bang for your buck
reviews.text: The beauty of this property is that all aspects of services (genuinely friendly staff, nice clean quiet rooms, fantastic guest amenities and excellent location) are that of 5 star material. While initially I thought the (1) bedroom suite was a bit small (which it was compared to the larger studio), I came to appreciate the separation by wall and 2nd TV in the bedroom. Very impressed with the comfortable queen bed, 1/2 dozen pillows with snappy new pillow cases... oh can't forget to throw a shout out to what seemed like brand new towels also.
Here's how far my $100 - out the door - got me and my family...
reviews.title: Great Hotel for a Family
Home away from Home
reviews.text: STAFF - Offered free shuttle* services within a 5 mile radius of hotel, which we took to the Great Mall of Milpitas and connecting light rail station. We took the light rail into downtown for dinner and San Jose Sharks hockey game... Accomadating early check in and late check out, allowed us time to relax between outings.

aka: Residence Inn Milpitas Silicon Valley Hotel
